summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 31st Avenue West, from West Howe Street to West Crockett Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with property owners' 100% Limit Petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 199124, to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
